ygData.subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Introducing a new friend ;)
ygData.msgSnippet: post on our message board lah... Singaporean are give priorty to enter guild anyway. ... From: LKW  To: * Singapore EQ Mailing
ygData.messageBody:
post on our message board lah... Singaporean are give priorty to enter guild
anyway.
----- Original Message -----
From: "LKW" <leekw13@...>
To: "'* Singapore EQ Mailing List'" <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 07, 2000 11:25 AM
Subject: [sg-everquest] Introducing a new friend ;)


> Hi,
>
> I've 2 UO friends who join us in EQ Innoruuk. They are both my closest
> buddies in UO Baja, and have gone thru's numerous live & death battles
with
> me in my entire UO life. Both of them are veteran online RPGers, so you
> guys dun have to worry abt them behaving like a newbie, hehe.
>
> They are Mistaya (lvl 30? wood elf ranger) and Yura (lvl 9 high-elf
> enchanter).
>
> Mistaya is playing in US time zone, so for those US players, if you are
> training ya twink at ya timezone, do consider her as a team member. ;)
>
> Yura is now staying in Australia, and is playing around S'pore time zone.
> So for S'pore twinks, you know who to ask for hunting ;)
>
> Both of them are mature players, so you know you can count on them at all
> times. Pls be nice to them if u happen to meet them online, thx.
>
> As Mistaya is playing in US timezone, she might be better off joining US
> guild. Yura, on the other hand, play in our timezone. Maybe some of u
can
> team with her and find out more abt her. I really wish to invite her to
> the guild and I know she will contribute well in EQ, just like my UO guild
> in Baja.
>
> Thx.
>
> Ziltus.
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Remember four years of good friends, bad clothes, explosive chemistry
> experiments.
> http://click.egroups.com/1/4051/8/_/436545/_/960350449/
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
> Singapore Everquest Players List
>
